body: The learning process is deeply tuned with learning program providers, teachers, and psychologists. We use several levels of tuning: system, subject, topic, question, and personalization level.

features.title: System Level
features.description: Global tuning of general pedagogical principles and safety frameworks.

features.title: Subject Level
features.description: Specific approach tailored to the unique methodology of each subject.

features.title: Topic Level
features.description: Optimized explanations for mastering specific subject areas.

features.title: Question Level
features.description: Building individual feedback maps for every single question.

features.title: Personalization Level
features.description: Adapting to the student's pace, psychological state, and perception style.
